i1.name: Crystal_Spires
description:
{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Skarner's''' presence causes 6 ''Crystal Spires'' to appear at set points on the [[Summoner's Rift|battlefield]]:
* One beside {{uis|Baron Nashor}} pit
* One beside {{uis|Dragon}} pit
* One nearby each buff {{tip|monster|monster's}} camp

''Crystal Spires'' can be captured by {{tip|champions}} after {{tip|minion|minions}} have spawned by standing near them for 2 seconds. Once captured, ''Crystal Spires'' are owned until contested and the defending team can stand on the spire to prevent the opposing team from capturing it.

''Crystal Spires'' grant {{g|30 gold}} split among its captors upon being captured, or {{g|15 gold}} if only a single champion participated in its capture. Capturing a ''Crystal Spire'' grants {{tip|sight}} of its radius for {{fd|1.5}} seconds and renders it unable to be captured again for 15 seconds.

'''Skarner''' gains ''Crystal Charge'' while within range of a ''Crystal Spire'' controlled by his team, for {{fd|1.25}} seconds after triggering {{ai|Crystal Venom|Skarner}}, and for {{fd|1.75}} seconds after stinging an enemy champion with {{ai|Impale|Skarner}}.

{{sbc|Crystal Charge:}} '''Skarner''' gains {{pp|70;72;74;76;78;80;82;85;88;91;94;97;100;104;108;112;116;120|formula = 68 + 2 per level up to 7, + 3 per level up to 13, and + 4 per level|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, {{pp|key=%|43;48;53;58;63;68;73;80;87;94;101;108;115;124;133;142;151;160|formula = 38 + 5 per level up to 7, + 7 per level up to 13, and + 9 per level|color=as}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and restores {{sti|mana|{{as|1% '''maximum''' mana}}}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Skarner's presence causes 6 Crystal Spires to appear at set points on the Summoner's Rift: * One beside Baron Nashor's pit * One beside Dragon's pit * One nearby each buff monster's camp
Crystal Spires can be captured by champions after minions have spawned by standing near them for 2 seconds. Once captured, Crystal Spires are owned until contested and the defending team can stand on the spire to prevent the opposing team from capturing it.
Crystal Spires grant 30 gold split among its captors upon being captured, or 15 gold if only a single champion participated in its capture. Capturing a Crystal Spire grants sight of its radius for 1.5 seconds and renders it unable to be captured again for 15 seconds.
Skarner gains Crystal Charge while within range of a Crystal Spire controlled by his team, for 1.25 seconds after triggering Skarner's Crystal Venom, and for 1.75 seconds after stinging an enemy champion with Skarner's Impale.
Crystal Charge: Skarner gains 70;72;74;76;78;80;82;85;88;91;94;97;100;104;108;112;116;120 − undefined (based on level) bonus movement speed, 43;48;53;58;63;68;73;80;87;94;101;108;115;124;133;142;151;160% − undefined% (based on level) bonus attack speed and restores 1% maximum mana every 0.5 seconds.
i1.notes: * ''Crystal Charge's'' duration refreshes if it was gained by an ability.

q1.name: Crystal_Slash
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Skarner''' slashes around himself, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all nearby enemies.
If an enemy is hit, subsequent casts of ''Crystal Slash'' within 5 seconds deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.
Basic attacks reduce ''Crystal Slash's'' {{sti|cooldown}} by {{fd|0.25}} seconds, quadrupled to 1 against enemy champions.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Skarner slashes around himself, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies.
If an enemy is hit, subsequent casts of Crystal Slash within 5 seconds deal bonus magic damage.
Basic attacks reduce Crystal Slash's cooldown by 0.25 seconds, quadrupled to 1 against enemy champions.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{as|{{ap|1 to 3}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|(+ 20% AD)}}}}

{{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|1 to 3}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|(+ 20% AD)}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Total Mixed Damage|{{as|{{ap|1*2 to 3*2}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|(+ 40% AD)}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}}}
q1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage but will not prevent '''Skarner''' from triggering the bonus effect.
* Basic attacks against structures will not trigger the cooldown reduction.

w1.name: Crystalline_Exoskeleton
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Skarner''' crystallizes himself, gaining a {{tip|shield}} for up to 6 seconds.
While the shield holds, '''Skarner''' additionally gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that increases in effectiveness by 100% over the first 3 seconds.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Skarner crystallizes himself, gaining a shield for up to 6 seconds.
While the shield holds, Skarner additionally gains bonus movement speed that increases in effectiveness by 100% over the first 3 seconds.
leveling: {{st|Initial Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|8 to 16}}%|Increased Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|8*2 to 16*2}}%}}

effects.str: • Shield Strength: % maximum health (+ 80% AP)

• Initial Bonus Movement Speed: %
  • Increased Bonus Movement Speed: %

e1.name: Fracture
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Every time '''Skarner''' triggers {{ai|Crystal Venom|Skarner}} or stings an enemy with {{ai|Impale|Skarner}}, ''Fracture's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by the corresponding '''base''' duration of the disable.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Skarner''' launches a blast of crystalline energy in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within its path and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{fd|2.5}} seconds, as well as marking them with {{ai|Crystal Venom|Skarner}} for 5 seconds.

'''Skarner's''' next [[basic attack]] against a target marked with {{ai|Crystal Venom|Skarner}} consumes the mark to deal them {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and {{tip|stun}} them for {{fd|1.25}} seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Every time Skarner triggers Skarner's Crystal Venom or stings an enemy with Skarner's Impale, Fracture's cooldown is reduced by the corresponding base duration of the disable.
Active: Skarner launches a blast of crystalline energy in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies within its path and slowing them for 2.5 seconds, as well as marking them with Skarner's Crystal Venom for 5 seconds.
Skarner's next basic attack against a target marked with Skarner's Crystal Venom consumes the mark to deal them bonus physical damage and stun them for 1.25 seconds.
e1.notes:
* ''Fracture'' is disabled during {{ai|Impale|Skarner}}.
{{Effect at cast time start}}
* ''Fracture's'' projectile deals {{tip|area damage}}, while the ''Crystal Venom'' on-hit effect deals {{tip|proc damage}}.
* ''Crystal Venom'' triggers even if the attack is {{tip|blocked}} ({{tip|stun}} applies), but not if it's {{tip|dodged}}. The damage of the entire attack is negated in both cases.
** {{Pending for test}}: {{tip|Blind}}.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 20% AP)
  • Slow: %

r1.name: Impale
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Skarner''' {{tip|root|roots}} the target enemy {{tip|champion}} over the cast time and attempts to impale them with his stinger. Upon successfully impaling the target, he deals them {{as|60% AD}} {{as|physical damage|physical damage}} and {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage|magic damage}} and {{tip|suppression|suppresses}} them for {{fd|1.75}} seconds, during which they are {{tip|true sight|revealed}} and '''Skarner''' can drag them with himself. At the end of the duration, the target takes the same damage again.
''Impale's'' drag ignores {{tip|displacement immunity}}.{{tt|*|See notes for additional details}}
'''''Skarner''' is unable to basic attack, cast {{ai|Fracture|Skarner}}, or use {{si|Flash}} during Impale.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Skarner roots the target enemy champion over the cast time and attempts to impale them with his stinger. Upon successfully impaling the target, he deals them 60% AD physical damage and bonus magic damage and suppresses them for 1.75 seconds, during which they are revealed and Skarner can drag them with himself. At the end of the duration, the target takes the same damage again.
Impale's drag ignores displacement immunity.*
Skarner is unable to basic attack, cast Skarner's Fracture, or use Flash during Impale.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{ap|20 to 100}}  {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}|Total Mixed Damage|{{ap|20*2 to 100*2}}  {{as|(+ 120% AD)}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* The target will not take ''Impale's'' secondary damage if the {{tip|suppression}} is removed before the duration ends.
{{Unit-targeted cancel conditions}}** The range cancel distance is 800 units.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not block the {{tip|root}}.
* ''Impale'' is special cased to end prematurely if the target is affected by {{ai|Devour|Tahm Kench}}, both for an ally and enemy {{ci|Tahm Kench}} or if '''Skarner''' is teleported by {{ai|Realm Warp|Ryze}}.
** ''Impale'' will not end prematurely if '''Skarner''' enters {{tip|resurrection}}.
* '''Skarner''' cannot use {{tip|Hex-gate|hex-gates}} during ''Impale''.
* While ''Impale'' is active, and for the purposes of direction-conditioned abilities, (e.g. {{ai|Petrifying Gaze|Cassiopeia}}, {{ai|Mocking Shout|Tryndamere}}) '''Skarner''' is considered to be facing in the direction he is moving and not the one his model is facing.
* ''Impale'' applies a small displacement to the target every {{fd|0.25}} seconds whenever they are not close to '''Skarner'''. These displacements do '''not''' apply {{tip|airborne}} and are not {{tt|flagged as displacements|For instance, Mordekaiser R and Sett R do not force-move their target in the classic sense, but pretend to be displacements for interactions like these.}}, meaning that targets who are not {{tip|Cc-immune|immune}} to the {{tip|suppression}} are also never immune to the displacement, either. As a consequence, {{tip|displacement immunity}} '''fails''' to ignore this movement. ''See the table below.''
{{Skarner Impale Unstoppability Interactions}}
{{ct|cast|spells=true,false,false,false,false}}
